description: Installs Puppet Via AD on all nodes that match the AD search query

pemaster.description: Puppet Master to bootstrap too, not required if puppet conf has server set on AD Node

adhost.description: required Computer with ad on it or domain controller

username.description: User who is able to look at ad and also install on machines ie administrator

filter.description: use the filter logic ie (name -like window-*)

logging.description: Log output of the agent installer

dryrun.description: Start installing or give list of computers from options
